TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XsltArgumentList extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.

span.span: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase es utilizada por el método.This class is used by the method. Permite a los parámetros y objetos de extensión que se debe invocar desde dentro de la hoja de estilos.It allows parameters and extension objects to be invoked from within the style sheet. Cuando los parámetros y objetos se agregan a la , están asociados a un nombre completo de espacio de nombres y un espacio de nombres URI, respectivamente.When the parameters and objects are added to the , they are associated with a namespace qualified name and a namespace URI, respectively. Los siguientes son las ventajas de pasar un objeto, en lugar de usar un script incrustado como ``:The following are advantages to passing an object rather than using an embedded script such as ``: - Proporciona una mejor encapsulación y reutilización de clases.Provides better encapsulation and reuse of classes. - Permite que las hojas de estilo se más pequeñas y más fáciles de mantener.Allows style sheets to be smaller and more easily maintained. - Permite que se pasen fragmentos de nodo (a través de la ) a la hoja de estilos.Supports passing node fragments (through the ) to the style sheet. Para obtener más información sobre el uso de la , consulte [objetos de extensión XSLT](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md) y [parámetros XSLT](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md).For more information about using the , see [XSLT Extension Objects](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md) and [XSLT Parameters](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md).

summary.span: Adds a new object to the and associates it with the namespace URI.

span.span: Adds a new object to the and associates it with the namespace URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El `params` (palabra clave), lo que permite un número indeterminado de parámetros que se pasan, no se admite actualmente.The `params` keyword, which allows an unspecified number of parameters to be passed, is currently not supported. Hojas de estilos XSLT que utilizan los métodos definidos con el `params` palabra clave no funciona correctamente.XSLT style sheets that utilize methods defined with the `params` keyword does not work correctly. Para obtener más información, consulte [params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md).For more information, see [params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, la hoja de estilos utiliza un objeto de extensión XSLT para convertir el precio del libro.In the following example, the style sheet uses an XSLT extension object to convert the book price. [!code-csharp[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/CS/addextobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/VB/addextobj.vb#1)] El ejemplo utiliza los siguientes archivos de datos como entrada.The example uses the following data files as input. `books.xml` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/XML/books.xml#2)] `prices.xsl` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddExtensionObject/XML/prices.xsl#3)]

span.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform

span.span: The already has an extension object associated with it.

exception.span: The caller does not have sufficient permissions to call this method.

param.name: name
param.span: The name to associate with the parameter.

span.span: The name to associate with the parameter.

param.name: namespaceUri
param.span: The namespace URI to associate with the parameter.

span.span: The namespace URI to associate with the parameter.

param.span: To use the default namespace, specify an empty string.

span.span: To use the default namespace, specify an empty string.

param.name: parameter
param.span: The parameter value or object to add to the list.

span.span: The parameter value or object to add to the list.

summary.span: Adds a parameter to the and associates it with the namespace qualified name.

span.span: Adds a parameter to the and associates it with the namespace qualified name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks El `parameter` debe corresponder a un tipo de W3C.The `parameter` should correspond to a W3C type. La tabla siguiente muestran los tipos W3C, XPath o XSLT y la clase.NET correspondiente.The following table shows the W3C types, either XPath or XSLT, and the corresponding.NET class. |Tipo W3CW3C Type|Clase Equivalent.NET (tipo)Equivalent.NET Class (Type)| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |`String` (XPath)`String` (XPath)|| |`Boolean` (XPath)`Boolean` (XPath)|| |`Number` (XPath)`Number` (XPath)|| |`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)`Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)|| |`Node Set` (XPath)`Node Set` (XPath)|

`XPathNavigator[]`| |`Node`\* (XPath)`Node`\* (XPath)|| \*Es equivalente a un conjunto de nodos que contiene un solo nodo.\*This is equivalent to a node set that contains a single node. Si el objeto de parámetro que se invoca desde la hoja de estilos no es uno de los pasos anteriores, se convierte según las reglas siguientes:If the parameter object being invoked from within the style sheet is not one of the above, it is converted according to the following rules: - Los tipos CLR numéricos se convierten en .CLR numeric types are converted to . - El tipo se convierte en .The type is converted to . - Los tipos se convierten en . types are converted to . `XPathNavigator[]` se convierte en .`XPathNavigator[]` is converted to . El resto de los tipos inician un error.All other types throw an error. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se usa el método para crear un parámetro que representa la fecha y hora actuales.The following example uses the method to create a parameter representing the current date and time. [!code-csharp[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/CS/addparam.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/VB/addparam.vb#1)] El ejemplo utiliza los siguientes dos archivos de datos como entrada.The example uses the following two data files as input. `order.xml` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/XML/order.xml#2)] `order.xsl` [!code-xml[XsltArgumentList.AddParam#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XsltArgumentList.AddParam/XML/order.xsl#3)]

span.span: The is either or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform.

exception.span: The is not a valid name according to the W3C XML specification.

span.span: The is not a valid name according to the W3C XML specification.

span.span: The already has a parameter associated with it.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Xml.Xsl.XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler XsltMessageEncountered;
.event class System.Xml.Xsl.XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler XsltMessageEncountered
Public Custom Event XsltMessageEncountered As XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler
public: event System::Xml::Xsl::XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler ^ XsltMessageEncountered;

summary.span: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the xsl:message element.

span.span: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the xsl:message element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el evento no está registrado, todos los mensajes se canalizan a la salida estándar.If the event is not registered, all messages are piped to standard out.
